posts.post_content:
I'm currently working on the Charleston T210 series 4 subset.

Need some help in upgrading a few, and filling in some empty slots.
If you have any around let me know.
Actually, I'm collecting the entire series 4 Virginia Valley League T210 subset, but I've been concentrating on the Charleston team lately ... I'm totally sick. :)

You guys have been beautiful  ...  same deal, cash, or trade.

Joe P.
